bio.p: Suresh M. is an Associate Professor at Amrita School of Business, Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham (University), Coimbatore, India. He holds a PhD in Project Management from Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay, India and Masterâ€™s in Industrial Engineering from PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, India. His research interests include issues related to healthcare operations, sustainability and performance management. He has authored several papers in Operations Management and currently working on Agile Healthcare Operations Management. He is also a member of International Society on Multiple Criteria Decision Making.
